mapper.select: select count(*) from buyer_info where bi_name like #{keyword}
mapper.insert: insert into mall_db.buyer_info (bi_seq, bi_id, bi_pwd, bi_name, bi_birth, bi_gender, bi_address, bi_phone, bi_email, bi_grade, bi_status) values (#{bi_seq}, #{bi_id}, #{bi_pwd}, #{bi_name}, #{bi_birth}, #{bi_gender}, #{bi_address}, #{bi_phone}, #{bi_email}, #{bi_grade}, #{bi_status})
mapper.update: update buyer_info set bi_name=#{bi_name}, bi_id=#{bi_id}, bi_birth=#{bi_birth}, bi_gender=#{bi_gender}, bi_address=#{bi_address}, bi_phone=#{bi_phone}, bi_email=#{bi_email}, bi_grade=#{bi_grade}, bi_status=#{bi_status}, bi_mod_dt=NOW() where bi_seq=#{bi_seq}
